hair_types.description: Hair with no natural wave or curl, laying flat from roots to ends.
Hair with a natural wave or slight curl, forming an 'S' shape.
Hair with a defined curl pattern, forming spirals or ringlets.
Hair with a tight curl or coil pattern, often forming small, dense curls or zigzag shapes.
Hair that is prone to frizziness, often dry and difficult to manage, creating a fluffy appearance.

hair_styles.name: Bob
hair_styles.description: A short haircut where the hair is typically cut straight around the head, at the level of the jaw or above.

hair_styles.name: Pixie
hair_styles.description: A very short haircut, often characterized by closely cropped sides and back with slightly longer hair on top.

hair_styles.name: Layered
hair_styles.description: A haircut in which the hair is cut into different lengths, creating layers and adding texture and volume.

hair_styles.name: Bob with Bangs
hair_styles.description: A bob haircut combined with a fringe or bangs that are cut straight across the forehead.

hair_styles.name: Long Layers
hair_styles.description: A hairstyle with long hair and layers cut throughout the length to create movement and dimension.

hair_styles.name: Chignon
hair_styles.description: A classic hairstyle where the hair is twisted or rolled into a knot and secured at the nape of the neck or back of the head.

hair_styles.name: French Braid
hair_styles.description: A braiding technique where the hair is divided into three sections and crossed over each other, creating a woven effect.

hair_styles.name: Ponytail
hair_styles.description: A hairstyle where the hair is gathered and secured at the back of the head, creating a tail-like appearance.

hair_styles.name: Mohawk
hair_styles.description: A hairstyle where the hair on the sides of the head is shaved or very short, while the hair in the middle is left longer and styled upwards.

hair_styles.name: Braided Crown
hair_styles.description: A hairstyle where the hair is braided around the head, creating a crown-like effect.

hair_styles.name: Undercut
hair_styles.description: A hairstyle where the sides and back are shaved very short, with longer hair on top.

hair_colors.description: Hair color ranging from very light yellow to light brown.
Hair color ranging from light brown to dark brown.
Hair color that is very dark, appearing black in most lighting.
Hair color ranging from light orange to dark reddish-brown.
Hair color with a mix of white, gray, and/or black strands, giving an overall gray appearance.
Hair color that is completely or nearly all white or very light gray.
Hair colors dyed in soft, washed-out pastel hues.

body_types.description: A body type characterized by muscle definition and low body fat, often associated with regular exercise and strength training.
A lean and linear body type with difficulty gaining weight or muscle mass.
A muscular and athletic body type with a natural ability to gain muscle and stay lean.
A rounder body type with a higher propensity for fat storage and difficulty losing weight.
A body type characterized by a well-defined waistline and balanced bust and hip measurements.
A body type with wider hips and thighs, and narrower shoulders and bust.
A body type with more weight distributed around the midsection, and less in the hips and thighs.
A body type with broader shoulders and bust, and narrower hips and waist.
A body type with fairly equal measurements for the bust, waist, and hips, creating a straight silhouette.
A body type with a wider midsection, narrower shoulders, and narrower hips.
A body type with more weight distributed in the upper body, creating a rounded shape.

eye_colors.name: Brown
eye_colors.description: A rich, dark color commonly found in individuals with higher levels of melanin in their irises.

eye_colors.name: Blue
eye_colors.description: A light or pale color that ranges from sky blue to a deeper, vibrant shade.

eye_colors.name: Green
eye_colors.description: A color that ranges from a light, yellowish-green to a deeper, vibrant shade of green.

eye_colors.name: Gray
eye_colors.description: A color that is predominantly gray, often with hints of blue, green, or hazel.

eye_colors.name: Amber
eye_colors.description: A warm, golden color with hints of brown, often associated with a mixture of green and gold pigments in the iris.

eye_colors.name: Heterochromia
eye_colors.description: A condition where each eye has a different color or where different parts of the same iris have different colors.

eye_colors.name: Black
eye_colors.description: A deep, dark color that appears almost black.

eye_colors.name: Silver
eye_colors.description: A color that resembles shiny silver or grayish-white.

eye_colors.name: Turquoise
eye_colors.description: A blue-green color reminiscent of the gemstone.

eye_colors.name: Violet
eye_colors.description: A rare eye color that appears purple, often due to a lack of melanin mixed with light reflecting off red blood vessels.
